text: "That Ole Devil Called Love" is a 1944 song by Billie Holiday and released it as a B-side to her single Lover Man. ==Alison Moyet version== In 1985, English singer Alison Moyet released her version of "That Ole Devil Called Love" as a non-album single. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and Ireland, number 1 in New Zealand, number 46 in Australia, number 5 in the Netherlands and number 10 in Switzerland. ==References== Category:1944 songs Category:Jazz pop songs Category:Billie Holiday songs Category:Alison Moyet songs Category:Tony Bennett songs Category:Ella Fitzgerald songs
title: That Ole Devil Called Love
